item.title: 交易日：美联储希望融化，股市下挫
item.description: 由于对美联储下月降息的预期迅速减弱，周四华尔街暴跌，国债收益率上升，美元也在美国资产价格惨淡的时段内下跌。【原文：Wall Street tumbled and Treasury yields rose on Thursday as expectations of a Federal Reserve interest rate cut next month faded rapidly, while the dollar also fell in a bleak session for U.S. asset prices.】

item.title: 华纳兄弟探索公司启动战略审查，包括出售公司
item.description: 华纳兄弟探索公司（Warner Bros Discovery）周四表示，针对多方主动提出的意向，公司已开始对战略替代方案进行审查。【原文：Warner Bros Discovery said on Thursday it had initiated a review of strategic alternatives in response to unsolicited interest from multiple parties.】

item.title: 标普数据显示，在信贷紧张的背景下，美国企业破产数量将创15年新高
item.description: S&P全球公司周四的数据显示，美国大型企业破产数量将创下15年来的最高水平，这凸显了美国企业在公开市场投资者的敏感时期面临着越来越大的压力。【原文：Large U.S. corporate bankruptcies are on pace to hit their highest level in 15 years, S&P Global data showed on Thursday, underscoring mounting stress across corporate America at a sensitive time for public market investors.】

item.title: 据彭博新闻社报道，米拉-穆拉提的 Thinking Machines 在融资谈判中寻求 500 亿美元的估值
item.description: 据彭博新闻社周四报道，由前 OpenAI 高管米拉-穆拉提（Mira Murati）创办的人工智能初创公司 Thinking Machines Lab 正在进行早期谈判，希望以约 500 亿美元的估值进行新一轮融资。【原文：Thinking Machines Lab, the artificial intelligence startup founded by former OpenAI executive Mira Murati, is in early talks to raise a new funding round at a roughly $50 billion valuation, Bloomberg News reported on Thursday.】

item.title: 数字贷款机构努比亚银行第三季度收入超预期，盈利能力创历史新高
item.description: 经营巴西数字贷款公司 Nubank 的上市实体 Nu Holdings 周四公布，在巴西和墨西哥业务的推动下，该公司第三季度净收入增长，超过了分析师的预期。【原文：Nu Holdings , the listed entity which runs Brazilian digital lender Nubank, posted on Thursday an increase in its third-quarter net income driven by its Brazilian and Mexican businesses, beating analysts' projections.】

item.title: 应用材料公司预测人工智能芯片需求将带来强劲的季度收入
item.description: 美国半导体制造设备制造商应用材料公司（Applied Materials）周四预测第一季度营收乐观，表明对用于制造人工智能芯片的工具的强劲需求将压倒整个行业的放缓。【原文：Applied Materials , U.S.-based maker of semiconductor manufacturing equipment, forecast upbeat first-quarter revenue on Thursday, signaling that robust demand for tools used to make AI chips is set to overpower a broader industry slowdown.】

item.title: 蓝色起源公司的新格伦火箭在美国国家航空航天局的首次任务中部署火星卫星
item.description: 亿万富翁杰夫-贝索斯（Jeff Bezos）的蓝色起源太空公司（Blue Origin）周四从佛罗里达州发射了巨型 "新格伦"（New Glenn）火箭，这是该公司首次为付费客户进行的首次飞行，搭载了两颗前往火星的卫星，这是该公司首次执行美国国家航空航天局（NASA）规模的科学任务。【原文：The Blue Origin space venture of billionaire Jeff Bezos launched its giant New Glenn rocket from Florida on Thursday on its debut flight for paying customers, carrying two satellites on their way to Mars in the company's first NASA-scale science mission.】

item.title: 彭博新闻社报道：美联储卡什卡利希望 10 月暂停降息
item.description: 明尼阿波利斯联储主席尼尔-卡什卡利（Neel Kashkari）周四在接受彭博新闻社采访时表示，鉴于经济的韧性，他不支持美联储在10月份降息，并表示他还没有决定在美联储下个月的会议上做什么。【原文：Minneapolis Federal Reserve President Neel Kashkari told Bloomberg News in an interview on Thursday that he did not support the Fed's interest-rate cut in October given the economy's resilience, and said he was undecided on what to do for the Fed's meeting next month.】

item.title: 苹果降低应用程序商店 "迷你应用程序 "佣金
item.description: 苹果公司周四表示，将降低 iPhone 和其他设备上 "迷你应用程序 "的佣金。【原文：Apple on Thursday said it would lower commissions for "mini apps" on iPhones and other devices.】

item.title: PIMCO 全球信贷首席投资官基塞尔退休
item.description: 债券巨头 PIMCO 董事总经理兼全球信贷首席投资官马克-基塞尔（Mark Kiesel）周四表示，他将从公司退休。【原文：Mark Kiesel, managing director and chief investment officer for global credit at bond giant PIMCO, is retiring from the firm, PIMCO said on Thursday.】

item.title: 消息人士称，白宫与高层管理人员的晚宴将讨论生活费用和抵押贷款问题
item.description: 据两位知情人士透露，在周三的白宫晚宴上，美国总统唐纳德-特朗普和华尔街高管讨论了生活成本上升和扩大住房所有权等问题。【原文：Rising living costs and expanding home ownership were among the issues U.S. President Donald Trump and top Wall Street executives discussed at Wednesday's White House dinner, according to two people with knowledge of the event.】

item.title: 诺和诺德、礼来否认与 Mangoceuticals 合作开发肥胖症药物
item.description: 诺和诺德（Novo Nordisk）和礼来（Eli Lilly）与远程保健网站 Mangoceuticals Inc 没有减肥药合作关系，两家公司的发言人拒绝接受该公司周四发布的一份新闻稿，该新闻稿描述了与这两家主要制药商的安排。【原文：Novo Nordisk and Eli Lilly do not have a weight-loss drug partnership with telehealth website Mangoceuticals Inc , spokespeople for both companies said, rejecting a press release issued by the company on Thursday that described arrangements with the two leading drugmakers.】

item.title: 英国广播公司（BBC）调查对特朗普另一篇演讲稿编辑的指控
item.description: 英国广播公司（BBC）周四表示，它正在调查《每日电讯报》发表的关于其另一个节目剪辑美国总统唐纳德-特朗普演讲的新指控。【原文：Britain's BBC said on Thursday it was looking into fresh allegations, published in The Telegraph newspaper, over the editing by another of its programmes of a speech by U.S. President Donald Trump.】

item.title: 罢工的波音公司工人通过劳资协议，结束了长达三个多月的罢工活动
item.description: 波音防务公司圣路易斯地区工厂的罢工工人周四投票通过了该公司的最新合同方案，工会官员说，罢工结束了长达101天的影响战斗机和其他项目生产的罢工。【原文：Striking workers at Boeing Defense's St. Louis-area facilities voted to approve the company's latest contract offer on Thursday, union officials said, ending the 101-day-long strike that has hampered production of fighter jets and other programs.】

item.title: 美联储哈马克降温通胀需要限制性货币政策
item.description: 克利夫兰联邦储备银行行长贝丝-哈马克（Beth Hammack）周四表示，利率政策应保持限制性，以便对仍然令人担忧的通胀水平施加下行压力。【原文：Federal Reserve Bank of Cleveland President Beth Hammack said on Thursday that interest rate policy should remain restrictive so it can put downward pressure on still concerning levels of inflation.】

item.title: 独家消息消息人士称凯雷正在探索收购卢克石油公司海外资产的方案
item.description: 三位熟知内情的消息人士透露，美国私募股权巨头凯雷公司（Carlyle）正在探索收购俄罗斯石油巨头卢克石油公司（Lukoil）海外资产的方案。【原文：U.S. private equity giant Carlyle is exploring options to buy Russian oil major Lukoil's foreign assets, three sources familiar with the situation said.】

item.title: 独家报道欧洲官员考虑汇集美元以减少特朗普冲击后对美联储的依赖
item.description: 五位熟悉内情的官员表示，欧洲金融稳定官员正在讨论是否通过汇集非美国央行持有的美元来建立美联储资金后盾的替代方案，以期在特朗普政府执政期间减少对美国的依赖。【原文：European financial stability officials are debating whether to create an alternative to Federal Reserve funding backstops by pooling dollars held by non-U.S. central banks in a bid to reduce their reliance on the U.S. under the Trump administration, five officials familiar with the matter said.】

item.title: 独家消息：消息人士称，LKQ 将与美国银行合作出售特种零部件业务
item.description: 三位熟悉内情的人士告诉路透社，汽车零部件供应商 LKQ 正计划出售其特种零部件部门 Keystone Automotive Industries，因为该公司面临着来自投资者的压力，要求其出售部分资产以实现股东价值最大化。【原文：Auto parts supplier LKQ is planning to sell Keystone Automotive Industries, its specialty parts division, three people familiar with the matter told Reuters, as the company faces pressure from investors to sell some assets to maximize shareholder value.】

item.title: 独家报道消息人士称，Nexperia客户正就绕过中欧芯片纷争的变通办法进行谈判
item.description: 两位接近Nexperia公司的消息人士告诉路透社，中资荷兰芯片制造商Nexperia公司的客户正在与该公司研究一种变通办法，以绕过该公司设在欧洲的部门与其设在中国的封装厂之间的争执。【原文：Customers of Chinese-owned Dutch chipmaker Nexperia are working with the company on a workaround to bypass a feud between the Europe-based unit and its packaging plant in China, two sources close to the firm told Reuters.】

item.title: Zalando 就网络内容规则诉诸欧盟最高法院
item.description: 欧洲最大的在线时尚零售商 Zalando 周四将其与欧盟在线内容规则的斗争诉诸欧洲最高法院，称下级法庭驳回其挑战是错误的。【原文：Zalando , Europe's biggest online fashion retailer, on Thursday took its fight against EU online content rules to Europe's highest court, saying that a lower tribunal had erred in throwing out its challenge.】

item.title: 瑞士国家银行称，瑞银收购瑞士信贷推高了瑞士银行的融资成本
item.description: 瑞士国家银行（Swiss National Bank）周四表示，与两年前相比，瑞士银行目前需要支付更多的费用来确保金融市场的流动性，并指出 2023 年瑞士信贷（Credit Suisse）的倒闭和竞争对手瑞银集团（UBS）的收购是原因之一。【原文：Swiss banks have to pay more currently to secure liquidity in the financial markets than two years ago, the Swiss National Bank said on Thursday, pointing to the 2023 collapse of Credit Suisse and takeover by rival UBS as one explanation.】

item.title: 育碧推迟发布半年财报并要求停牌
item.description: 法国视频游戏发行商育碧公司周四表示，将推迟公布半年财报，并要求泛欧交易所从周五起暂停其股票和债券交易。【原文：French video game publisher Ubisoft said on Thursday it was postponing the publication of its half-year earnings and requested Euronext suspend trading of its shares and bonds starting Friday.】

item.title: 据彭博新闻社报道，特斯拉正努力将苹果 CarPlay 集成到其电动汽车中
item.description: 据彭博新闻社周四援引知情人士的话报道，特斯拉正在开发在其电动汽车上支持苹果公司的 CarPlay 系统。【原文：Tesla is developing support for Apple's CarPlay system in its electric vehicles, Bloomberg News reported on Thursday, citing people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 追踪星巴克与工会的斗争
item.description: 周四，1000 多名星巴克工会咖啡师发起无限期罢工，加紧推动就该咖啡巨头的薪酬和其他福利达成集体谈判协议。【原文：More than 1,000 Starbucks unionized baristas launched an open-ended strike on Thursday, intensifying their push for a collective bargaining agreement over pay and other benefits at the coffee giant.】

item.title: 代码生成初创公司 Cursor 在最新一轮融资中估值增长近三倍，达到 300 亿美元
item.description: 代码生成初创公司 Cursor 在最新一轮融资中筹集了 23 亿美元，五个月内估值增长了近两倍，达到 293 亿美元，人工智能公司继续吸引投资者的关注。【原文：Code-generation startup Cursor nearly tripled its valuation to $29.3 billion in five months after raising $2.3 billion in its latest funding round, as artificial intelligence companies continue to attract investor attention.】

item.title: 美国需求不确定，惠誉下调阿斯顿-马丁评级
item.description: 信用评级机构惠誉国际评级公司（Fitch Ratings）下调了英国汽车制造商阿斯顿-马丁（Aston Martin）的债务评级，理由是这家豪华跑车制造商的现金流持续为负，而且其美国客户群存在不确定性。【原文：Credit rating agency Fitch Ratings has downgraded British automaker Aston Martin's debt ratings, citing the luxury sports car maker's persistent negative cash flow and uncertainty around its U.S. customer base.】

item.title: 消息人士称 Verizon 将在重组过程中裁员约 15,000 人
item.description: 一位熟悉内情的人士周四告诉路透社，作为公司重组工作的一部分，Verizon 计划裁员约 15,000 人。【原文：Verizon is planning to cut about 15,000 jobs as part of the company's restructuring efforts, a person familiar with the matter told Reuters on Thursday.】

item.title: OpenAI 支持旨在阻止人工智能生物武器的初创公司
item.description: ChatGPT 制造商 OpenAI 周四表示，它将投资一家初创公司，该公司致力于阻止坏人利用人工智能制造生物武器。【原文：ChatGPT maker OpenAI on Thursday said it will invest in a startup focused on blocking bad actors from creating biological weapons powered by artificial intelligence.】

item.title: Citgo 盈利增至 1.67 亿美元，流动资金增至 27.5 亿美元
item.description: 美国 Citgo 石油公司周四表示，该公司第三季度的利润从上一季度的 1 亿美元增至 1.67 亿美元，而这家委内瑞拉所有的炼油企业的流动资金从 26 亿美元增至 27.5 亿美元。【原文：U.S. Citgo Petroleum's profit rose to $167 million in the third quarter from $100 million in the previous period, while the liquidity of the Venezuela-owned refiner increased to $2.75 billion from $2.6 billion, the company said on Thursday.】

item.title: 特斯拉因起火风险在美国召回 10,500 块 Powerwall 2 电池
item.description: 特斯拉周四表示，在收到 22 起过热报告后，公司将在美国召回约 10,500 套 Powerwall 2 电池供电系统，原因是存在起火和燃烧危险。【原文：Tesla said on Thursday it is recalling about 10,500 units of its Powerwall 2 battery power systems in the U.S. for fire and burn hazards after receiving 22 reports of overheating.】
